title: NEAR emerges as top gainer, open interest at 4-month high
description: NEAR Protocol’s native token, NEAR, gained bullish momentum over the past week and just reached its 10-month-high. NEAR is up 17.6% in the past 24 hours and is trading at $2.74 at the time of writing — a level last…

title: Coinbase CEO Speaks Against US Senators’ Anti-Crypto Stance
description:
Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong criticized United States Senators Roger Marshall and Elizabeth Warren’s anti-crypto stance, reflecting on their controversial anti-crypto bill. Highlighting the growing adoption and potential benefits of digital assets, Armstrong asserted, “Being anti-crypto is a really bad political strategy going into 2024.” Recently, the Chamber of Digital Commerce, the world’s leading blockchain trade […]

The post Coinbase CEO Speaks Against US Senators’ Anti-Crypto Stance appeared first on Coin Edition.
